Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 25th overall pick, by Boston in 1981...
Injured on 6/2/1985 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/1/1988, off Bert Blyleven (DET)...
Injured on 4/13/1989 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Released by Boston on 4/18/1989...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/23/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $722,000 per year...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/1995, off John Burkett (PHI)...
